articles.description: Skin rashes and fever, the common symptoms in both monkeypox and chickenpox have caused confusion among people although doctors have stressed that there is a difference in the way the symptoms of both viral diseases manifest in patients.
articles.content:
In the rainy season, chickenpox cases are largely on the rise.
